comments: The more I play the more this game is broken ... the AI for the troupes constantly suicide even if you keep rallying them , I am lvl 169 and I am constantly getting attacked by lvl 220 and up no lies , I can give screenshots because that is fair ... this is 1-5 times at least per hour ... this game from very fun became very frustrating. The game creators could give 2 sh/ts about what is going on .

My phone is not rooted or jail broken, I do not have any hacks installed. I get a message saying illegal program detected by XIGNCODE3. Even after multiple uninstalls/installs, reboots, cache clears. All that time and energy wasted!!!

This is the game I have been searching for. But can't give 5 star because of 2 main reasons. Consume too many data while playing that required fast network and too many bugs... Problems free=5 stars.. What happen? I cannot even play the game now.. I once install and play and later uninstall because of game problem. Now I install and try to play again. I cannot play.. What is the problem? I also want to recover my account too..

Gameplay and graphics is great BUT as you progress you spend more time upgrading units and buildings. Some upgrades take up to a week of upgrading rendering those villagers useless aswell as the rate at which resources comes in as you collect doesnt compensate enough for the costs of upgrades. Its unnecessarily STRETCHED OUT. because of this its a 3 star rating...DONT DOWNLOAD IF YOU HAVE NO PATIENCE. Been playing a year and i dont feel my progress is a representation of the time i have put in. Been playing almost daily!

If you are going to do updates on this game, at least MAKE SURE it isn't lagging! My game since the update has been freezing up and lagging to the point that I select something (a wall for example) and the whole  game freezes and takes a million years just to LOAD. If this game isn't fixed, I'm demanding all my money spent on the game refunded and uninstallment. Not happy.

This is the exact definition of a strategy game, the controls are great and its free. You get to choose your own nation which just adds to the strategy, plus whatever you do in a battle can affect the entire battle. I would recommend it to people who want something with strategy and a bit of hardcoreness. The learning curve is quite steep sometimes.
description: Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!BUILD a unique village of your own design. LEAD loyal citizens from the dawn of antiquity to the modern era. BATTLE cooperatively and competitively with players from across the world. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.DOMINATIONS FEATURES:GREAT LEADERS!• At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.• Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!BRAND NEW EVENTS!• Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.• Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE• Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.• Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.• Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY• Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.• Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.• Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!• Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.• Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES• Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!• Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.• Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.• Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger. descriptionHTML:
Grow a flourishing civilization and journey through all of human history as the leader of a mighty Nation!

BUILD a unique village of your own design. LEAD loyal citizens from the dawn of antiquity to the modern era. BATTLE cooperatively and competitively with players from across the world. RAID competing Nations for all their good loot!

Battle and build a civilization through history as you aim to conquer the world in DomiNations.

DOMINATIONS FEATURES:

GREAT LEADERS!
• At the new University, consult Leonardo Da Vinci, Catherine the Great, King Sejong and other historic thought leaders.
• Strengthen your Nation with the best war strategy!

BRAND NEW EVENTS!
• Accomplish fun limited-time goals based on actual events from history.
• Collect rare rewards to help your Nation advance so they can conquer the world!

FROM THE STONE AGE TO THE SPACE AGE
• Lead a colony of early hunters and gatherers on their conquest through the ages from the dawn of civilization to the modern era.
• Design a small civilization and grow it into a thriving metropolis.
• Build historic Wonders of the World, including famous landmarks like the Pyramids of Egypt and the Roman Colosseum.

CHOOSE YOUR NATION AND LEAD AN ARMY
• Battle as of one of 8 fearsome Nations on its journey through time.
• Choose one of the great civilizations from history like the Romans, British, Chinese, French, Germans, Japanese, Koreans and Greeks.
• Tackle historic battle campaigns to collect important resources and upgrade your city as you advance through history!
• Each civilization has a special strength to help you build unique units.
• Battle through history and advance your city, like longbowmen, vandals, and the mighty samurai!

DISCOVER NEW TECHNOLOGIES
• Legendary game designer Brian Reynolds brings history to life in every era as key advancements from each period in history will help you progress your epic civilization!
• Research each civilization, new materials, invent advanced weaponry, and develop trade to grow a bustling economy.
• Through scientific discovery, strengthen your troops with better equipment, upgrade your buildings and town center with modern materials.
• Create a war strategy to bolster your defenses as you grow stronger.

FORM AN ALLIANCE AND WAGE WORLD WAR
• Put your powerful Nation to the ultimate test in PvP combat and raid your enemies’ cities for huge bunches of loot!
• Battle for crucial resources, untold wealth, and total world domination.
• Team up with other skilled rulers and forge an unstoppable Alliance.
• Unleash the full force of your armies with a unique battle strategy to outwit and outlast your opponents in 50-on-50 Alliance warfare.
• Conquer the globe in World War and take home the spoils of war!

Build one of history’s greatest civilizations and develop a battle strategy to conquer opponents. Join an alliance and achieve world domination in DomiNations!

Download now to start building your civilization

NOTES:

A network connection and iOS 7 or above are required. DomiNations is optimized for iPads and iPhones generation 4S and newer. Playing on an iPhone 4 may result in slower performance and increased load times. The game is free to play, with additional purchases available in-game. If you do not want to make purchases in-game, please disable in-app purchases from your device settings.

Privacy Policy:
https://www.nexonm.com/privacy-policy/

Terms of Service:
https://www.nexonm.com/terms-of-use/

6121 Hollis Street
Emeryville CA 94608
United States
recentChanges: - Expand your civilization with 15 new spaces to explore!
- Research Haile Selassie’s skill tree at the University to improve your late-game combat defenses.
- Harness the power of his Capstone, Lion of Judah, unlocking the ability to build a Rocket Arsenal to defend your base!
- Town Center now has increased white radius where defenders are triggered.
- Japanese Town Centers features an additional yellow ring to show its firing range.
summary: Battle strategy game: Build an empire, wage war & conquer nations across history
title: DomiNations

description: Game PlayLearn and build through play! Brainy Arkies is more than just a game for building your very own island together with its cute and friendly inhabitants – The Arkies. You can also challenge yourself to questions* or access guided solutions to help you improve your maths. The more questions you complete, the faster your Arkies will level up, the further you will advance your world and to various Ages beyond! Join the Arkies in learning Maths the fun way today! * Suitable for Primary 1 through 6 FeaturesFor childrenEmbark on an innovative, fun and adaptive learning journey· Create your unique world and explore different Ages· Level up your Arkies by completing maths questions correctly· Participate in mini games and challenge your friends to new high scores· Complete up to 18,000 maths questions based on the Singapore Maths curriculum· Review maths concepts through step-by-step video solutions· Boost your maths with recommended animated tutorials and guided exercisesFor parentsBe involved in your child’s education· See detailed reports of your child’s progress and learning experience· Supervise learning and select topics for your child to focus on via the parent’s control panelIn-App Purchases· The App is Free!· Subscribe to unlock full access up to 18,000 intuitive questions for your childSubscriptionThe following subscriptions are available. (Prices shown are for Singapore region)· 1 Month – $9.98· 6 Months – $41.98· 12 Months – $71.98This App includes an option to auto renew subscriptions. descriptionHTML:
Game Play

Learn and build through play! Brainy Arkies is more than just a game for building your very own island together with its cute and friendly inhabitants – The Arkies. You can also challenge yourself to questions* or access guided solutions to help you improve your maths. The more questions you complete, the faster your Arkies will level up, the further you will advance your world and to various Ages beyond!

Join the Arkies in learning Maths the fun way today!
* Suitable for Primary 1 through 6 Features

For children

Embark on an innovative, fun and adaptive learning journey

· Create your unique world and explore different Ages
· Level up your Arkies by completing maths questions correctly
· Participate in mini games and challenge your friends to new high scores
· Complete up to 18,000 maths questions based on the Singapore Maths curriculum
· Review maths concepts through step-by-step video solutions
· Boost your maths with recommended animated tutorials and guided exercises

For parents

Be involved in your child’s education

· See detailed reports of your child’s progress and learning experience
· Supervise learning and select topics for your child to focus on via the parent’s control panel

In-App Purchases

· The App is Free!
· Subscribe to unlock full access up to 18,000 intuitive questions for your child

Subscription

The following subscriptions are available. (Prices shown are for Singapore region)

· 1 Month – $9.98
· 6 Months – $41.98
· 12 Months – $71.98

This App includes an option to auto renew subscriptions. If you have any questions or need further information, email us at support@brainyarkies.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BrainyArkies

comments: While the overall gameplay is pretty good. The whole game is literally a grind fest. Keep playing the same level over and over until you can upgrade, play another level, then proceed to keep playing the same level again. The competitive mode is also messed up as the opponent gets scores near impossible

Everything is great and good but only have one problem. And this problem will killing you all. That's the loading is damn slow no matter you are in LTE network or wifi situation. Because of slow loading it will kill your battery life fast as well. Please help to fix the problem and I will re-rate again. Thanks

Even with a perfect LTE speed game struggled with downloading hunts. The game forces you to do certain hunts before you can go back to the ones you like and want to finish. Not too mention every other minute it forces you to watch an ad or tries to get you to buy something from them. I will be deleting this app once i finish posting this comment.

The game currently wont open, when it does its constantly crashing and force stopping. I have the silver subscription ($1.00/weekly) and im unable to take advantage of the content im paying for  want a refund. The upgrades and new equipment are too expensive, the gear and parts are also too expensive and hard to come by especially for the spearfishing which is the best part of the game.. You certainly can't get very far without spending some real money. You can be killed by animals when the come from behind so you with your limited turning capability you have no chance to defend yourself. A lot of problems.
During cts theres moments get sudden lag and it throws off the shooting causing to miss when i know aiming right. It never had these lag bits before.

Really really awesome and detailed graphics and game play, but did you really have to make it so so so hard to play without paying? There's constant need to upgrade and always a shortage of currency...a bit sad. I mean you show quite a good amount of ad already

description: Super Adventure is an amazing games running, jumping and adventure game. Be careful with the obstructions on the way! This is the most challenging adventure. It really is a tough and challenging super jump game. It will challenge your focus and jump timing skills.Features game:- More than 100 colorful levels. Map carefully designed to make the adventure more enjoyable and addictive- Super worlds unlock free when play to end of that super world.- Collect coins with ease- Tricky monsters: snails, spiders, scorpion, carnivorous flower and so many other enemies...-  Great HD graphics and animations .How to play:- Move buttons: move right, left, jump and down the ladder with super simple controllers.- Tap to jump and double tap to double jump and escape the pitfalls. Beware of sign boards and complete all the levels.- You can jump on your enemies to kill them and your goal is to guide boy to end.In this Super Adventure game you have to finish level by level to move to another world. descriptionHTML:
Super Adventure is an amazing games running, jumping and adventure game. Be careful with the obstructions on the way! This is the most challenging adventure. It really is a tough and challenging super jump game. It will challenge your focus and jump timing skills.

Features game:
- More than 100 colorful levels. Map carefully designed to make the adventure more enjoyable and addictive
- Super worlds unlock free when play to end of that super world.
- Collect coins with ease
- Tricky monsters: snails, spiders, scorpion, carnivorous flower and so many other enemies...
- Great HD graphics and animations .

How to play:
- Move buttons: move right, left, jump and down the ladder with super simple controllers.
- Tap to jump and double tap to double jump and escape the pitfalls. Beware of sign boards and complete all the levels.
- You can jump on your enemies to kill them and your goal is to guide boy to end.

In this Super Adventure game you have to finish level by level to move to another world. The higher the level, the more obstacles and enemies you have to face. You may not know when a obstacle would appear or when a enemy would approach you, so you need to be alert all the time and this is highly exercising for your brain. The game helps in relieving stress and improves the response time as the player needs to be quick and attentive to face off the challenges.

Contact with us:

Super Adventure game, bring back your memory of childhood!
summary: Start adventure now and smash through those tricky monsters
title: Super Adventure

comments: I'm sorry but this game is so boring for me. And the chore is too repetetive. Maybe because I dont understand Mark's life. Never been there. There's nothing exciting about it. No matter what you choose in the game they all end up the same. I dont recommend this game if you have to pay

Hey everyone, the only complaint i have is that when you accidently skip a nice text, you cannot read briefs or go back to see what you missed. Which ends up leaving you a bit confused on what happened as well as not knowing the main part of this game, whixh is the story line. Great game so far im on the seocnd day but i suggest no one skip texts accidently. Watch your fingers for the screen

Shows a glimpse of high school students and how... weird their lifes can be. It's Dark, to say the least. The only thing I suggest improving is the grammar. I mean it's not that bad that you can't understand the sentences but still you should really fix it. Also can create a sequel or something because I'm really not able to get closure.

The game was really good, I could relate to the character, the graphics were really good and the story was also a good one. I only have two problems with it. The grammar, that needs to be improved as there are a lot of mistakes. And the bloody ending. I won't spoil it but it was the most terrible way they could've ended the game.

Bad English. There were times were I couldn't even understand it. The game was okay. There was an element of depression but just the surface part of it. It hooked for a while but the game was just too repeatetive. Yeah, you could say that the game intended it to be that way but I still thought there should be at least a little difference in gameplay as you progress considering there are only 13 days to play (-1 day of unconsciousness)

The only good thing is the artstyle. Even then, it's not great. The grey pallette is really good at setting the tone and the low-res gives a foggy feeling.   The writing is bad on every level. The characters are flat, the setting is so over-the-top sad that it's funny, there's no real story, things come out of nowhere, the grammar is bad enough to take the emotional weight out of suicide and cancer, and so much more that I don't care enough to mention.  The sound design is pretty good. Not much to say there.

description: Fhacktions is a free location based MOBA where you must become a hacker to survive. Conquer servers in real world locations to gain power and currency. Join your friends and fight other players in epic arena battles of 5v5 using avatars. Be part of a faction and recruit more members, because only through strategy, cooperation and teamwork will you conquer the world. FeaturesConquest ModeExplore the real world and conquer servers that are strategically placed around your city. When you attack a server, you must gain control the defensive towers. Then the server is yours. If the server belongs to another faction or player, you must first kill all the defenders. Avatars that die in a conquest battle don’t respawn, so plan a strategy! DefenseThe winners take control of the server and receive CP (computing power) and Virtcoins. You need CP to use your skills at higher levels and Virtcoins are used to buy customizations for your avatars and buy boosts. Once you take control of a server, you can defend it remotely from the comfort of your home. Quick BattleGain experience and level for your avatars in Quick Battle. Two teams face each other in epic battles of 5v5. The team who first captures all the turrets placed around the arena is victorious. If your avatar dies during the fight, it gains a respawn cooldown which increases each time it dies. Different avatars with multiple skillsWield powerful weapons that strike from afar with a GUNNER, strike deadly melee blows with a STRIKER or use defensive technology with a FIXER to heal your teammates. Use your CP (Computing Power) to choose from over a dozen abilities and add more of them to your arsenal. You decide which avatar to use depending on the fight, your strategy and your teammates. Customize your avatarChoose from hundreds of armor combinations and change the appearance of your avatar, giving it a unique look.FactionsFactions share the spoils of victory with their members, and are needed to defend the ever-growing hacker empires from enemy attacks. Invite your friends and help each other survive! The Black MarketIn the Black Market you can purchase new skins for your avatars, personal servers, boosts and more.
descriptionHTML:
Fhacktions is a free location based MOBA where you must become a hacker to survive. Conquer servers in real world locations to gain power and currency. Join your friends and fight other players in epic arena battles of 5v5 using avatars. Be part of a faction and recruit more members, because only through strategy, cooperation and teamwork will you conquer the world.

Features

Conquest Mode

Explore the real world and conquer servers that are strategically placed around your city. When you attack a server, you must gain control the defensive towers. Then the server is yours. If the server belongs to another faction or player, you must first kill all the defenders. Avatars that die in a conquest battle don’t respawn, so plan a strategy!

Defense

The winners take control of the server and receive CP (computing power) and Virtcoins. You need CP to use your skills at higher levels and Virtcoins are used to buy customizations for your avatars and buy boosts. Once you take control of a server, you can defend it remotely from the comfort of your home.

Quick Battle

Gain experience and level for your avatars in Quick Battle. Two teams face each other in epic battles of 5v5. The team who first captures all the turrets placed around the arena is victorious. If your avatar dies during the fight, it gains a respawn cooldown which increases each time it dies.

Different avatars with multiple skills

Wield powerful weapons that strike from afar with a GUNNER, strike deadly melee blows with a STRIKER or use defensive technology with a FIXER to heal your teammates. Use your CP (Computing Power) to choose from over a dozen abilities and add more of them to your arsenal. You decide which avatar to use depending on the fight, your strategy and your teammates.

Customize your avatar

Choose from hundreds of armor combinations and change the appearance of your avatar, giving it a unique look.

Factions

Factions share the spoils of victory with their members, and are needed to defend the ever-growing hacker empires from enemy attacks. Invite your friends and help each other survive!

The Black Market

In the Black Market you can purchase new skins for your avatars, personal servers, boosts and more.

Race, drift, crash, jump, and flip around huge detailed open city, perform tricks and stunts, and have fun! descriptionHTML:
Take control of some amazingly real drift cars (speed car, SUV and 4x4) in a huge driving environment ready to explore, with a big city, forests, canyons, hills and mountains : more than 16 km² of area and 30 km of roads!
Drive fast and drift hard on 8 amazing different tracks.

!! Drift Car Driving Simulator contains 24 free levels !!
It is the latest and one of the best car drifting simulators!

Make your choice between city cars, offroad cars, and speed cars.
Customize them and change tire, wheel, smoke, colors, and more...
Drift in a whole city with realistic and intense traffic, and try 8 tracks to pull off super long drifts.
Experience real drift in fast and agile sports cars in one of the car drifting simulators.
Complete tons of missions to become a professional drifter and to become rich!

The city is very big with real traffic cars, buildings, houses, bridges and traffic lights. Race and drift fast past police cars, ambulances, taxi cabs and more throughout the huge city and offroad world.
Drive around and see the sights like rivers and lakes, an ancient Japanese temple, airport with other aircrafts and planes, secluded houses and farms, ruins, a camping place, and more...
The road system are also very dense, from highways and 2x2 lanes, to very small road of mountains, with hill climb.

Get involved in drift races and high speed pursuits with cop cars in this all new drifting simulator


Features :
- Hugely open world driving simulator with city, construction, dockyard environments... filled with wide open roads, mountains, hills and forests
- Miles of roads to drift and drive on and do stunt jumps
- Dynamic traffic with real and intense traffic AI
- Realistic driving simulator, ultimate driving experience
- Realistic drifting physics
- High quality vehicles
- Dynamic camera angles

comments: Cool, nice improvement from MCoC. I love how the dev put Generation version of Transformers to the game specially Combiner wars and Titans Return (my recent favorite TF toylines). i hope the dev put references in the generation bots name since the movie and beast war character has reference on it.  But 1 thing is why my achievements doesn't work ??

Beautiful graphics, love the collection of characters. One of the greats, definitely a must. Love the aesthetics of the maps and battles. My only complaint is my bot entering the fight already transformed unlike the cpu. I think both should enter in alt form THEN transform, if only to hear the sound lol.

Much better than I thought it would be. It's an unconventional fighter to be sure but it's fun. The models in the game are amazing and somewhat bum me out they aren't being used for a more traditional 2d fighter on a thing that uses controllers. They were even able to make the Bayformers look good!  The many currencies and general in-game transactions are probably turning me off of what is otherwise a neat game. Kinda wish I could just buy it, have everything unlocked, and not have any of that garbage influence the design at all.  Besides that the team did a great job with what I imagine Hasbro told them to do.

Great game good graphics nice controllers needs more characters and more unique attacks, had to edit from a 4* to a 2* star because the game is a fighting with no live action PvP mode. It's strictly a player vs ai game and that is unattractive to players who enjoy the competitive edge of a PvP fighting game. Will uninstall it gets very boring and repetitive , with out the PvP mode. Will reinstall when or if PvP ever becomes available. Me and a larger group of fighting game players will be waiting to invest in this game once PvP becomes available.

I think it is an amazing game. I have a few requests: Have the dupe rate of daily crystals lowered Add more ways to get Energon  Add at least one of these:  Rumble Frenzy   G1 Onslaught  G1  Hot Rod   Prime Soundwave   Any G1 Stunticons  Cyclonus #Gameoftheyear

Good game but you can only collect so many bots before the spinning crystals start giving you the same ones day after day after day, frustratingly stopping next to characters you don't have. I haven't had a new character in months and play it daily. Also some love for Robots in Disguise or TF Animated characters would be awesome.

Join Optimus Prime, Megatron, Bumblebee, Waspinator, Rhinox, Grimlock, Soundwave and many more of your favorite bots in the battle for supremacy where Transformers universes collide. comments: The game was mildly okay but when you throw in their practice of giving you "free gems" for playing their sponsored games and then swapping them out or reducing the reward at an interval faster than you can complete the task you end up with a shady offering for "free" things. That is a business model that questions any real money I would put into it. Don't bait freemium users into wasted effort. Good thing I realize this before I spent any real money here.

The game concept is excellent! Graphics and music are great. Love the fact that there are free keys to unlock chest which contents legendary heroes instead of using gems ( if you have the patience ). Finally, you can upgrade, promote, evovle and change heroes' skin! Try it 5/5
Can't log in fix the back end server,  if you know and see people like the game update it so we can play more!
So far so good, i like the gameplay. But too early games for me to rate 5 star. Lets see how this goes when I'm in mid stage. For now its a good game.
I think everything is fine about the game...only a more attractive art-style for me that needs more work. I hardly like the artstyle but overall is fun. I stick around

comments: After two years of playing i have to revise my review from a 4 to 2.  Virtually the only content released in the last year has been meaningless grind content.  All the trial bosses and story updates that made year one so fun to play have been absent the second year with no signs the game will recieve content again.  A shame the game was run into the ground.
Stuck in an endless loop of downloading a new update, then failing to load that update which then redownloads the update only to not work, starting an endless cycle.
played a few days, game bugged, lost all my data. ho well.
Love this game! Makes me excited to see old RPG elements that I grew up with. Great to see the old FF crew again!
The game is okay but some things are too confusing like why Tomb Raider trust moogles don't work with Lara Croft.  It says wrong trust, I have like 20 of these trust moogles that just don't work.
A sweet experience though the finger controls do have a bit of a curve. Regardless, it is faithful to my Final Fantasy memories.

descriptionHTML:
So begins a new tale of crystals....

A tried-and-true, yet brand new RPG！

SQUARE ENIX’s first title aimed at a worldwide audience;
a brand new FINAL FANTASY game available for smartphones!
Play an entirely new RPG made in classic FINAL FANTASY style!

Includes characters
from past FINAL FANTASY titles!

Enjoy this expansive storyline
right on your phone!

=========================================
Features

-Simple battle feature with strategy!
Easy and interactive battles! Tap the screen to attack, but combine magic abilities with tactical know-how to overpower your opponents in strategic maneuvers!Plus!
High quality CG animations of your favorite FINAL FANTASY summons!

-Search in the field and complete dungeons!
Move characters through fields and dungeons to search for items, hidden paths, and new routes to your destinations!
Talk to people in towns to receive quests. Complete them to get items, gil, and even rare items!
It's got all the many features of an RPG in an easy portable form!

- Arena PVP battles!
Fight other players and get to the top!
Take your favorite party to war against your rivals and fight for great prizes!

=========================================
Story

Visions――
The hopes and dreams of
legendary warriors given life.
 
Lapis――
A world of crystals and the visions that slumber within.

Harnessing the power of the crystals,
mankind prospered, nations flourished.
But just as day gives way to night,
that era of peace proved but a fleeting illusion.
 
Now, as their world stands on the precipice
of ruin, two young knights summon visions
to their side as they strike out on a journey
to chase the shadows.
 
So begins a new tale of crystals,
and the heroes who would save them...

description: Take a chance to have a virtual pony that you’ve always wanted. Your pony likes running, swimming, gardening, watching beautiful butterflies and, mostly, being a part of your life! Adopt the cutest pony in the world and make your dreams come true.Take care of your pet’s feeding, sleeping and health. Shower your pony under the waterfall or wash him in a lake. For a good and quiet sleep, put the pony in a stable and turn off the sun. Sometimes you have to take your pet to the animal hospital to heal his broken bones, cure his teeth or replace an old horse shoe. Train your doctor skills and enjoy being a veterinarian and horse dentist in your pony’s world. Explore pony’s green land, lake, prairie and steppe. Grow your own vegetables, cereals and fruits like carrots, wheat, apples and many more. Plant flowers to attract butterflies so you can fill all pages in your butterfly collection album. You can customize pony’s home, stable, castle and trees to create a dream world for your pony. Have fun playing different mini games, like Diamond Connect, Flying Pony, Pony Jumping and Pony Racing. Earn coins to do a pony makeover and unleash your creativity. Make a rainbow unicorn, galaxy pony, fairy pony and many others. Complete as many funny quests as possible to get super shiny rewards. Your cute pet needs some loving care. We promise you’ll have the best virtual pony in the world!Note: All items are available for different prices in virtual currencies, but the game also contains items which can be purchased with real money.

description: Dead or alive, save or kill. When the doomsday virus is spread to this place, you wish to become a hero to save people, or just is a prey which is swallowed by zombies? Crowds of zombies are coming to you! Lift your gun, open fire to release your fury! Fight for yourself, fight for your families and friends, fight for the humanity!!   Zombie shooter: fury of war is one of FPS zombie shooting game, you need to hunt zombies, keep alive and save the survivals. Kinds of weapons can let you hunt zombies by any way you prefer. Whether you like accurate short-bursts or like the rain of bullets, whether you like a close battle or single shot from long distance, you can feel good shooting pleasure by using different guns in this game. On the critical moment, the freezing grenade, time bomb, you can choose suitable equipment to help you to escape from the dangerous ground. There are some elements in the scene of this game can be interacted by shooting, like you can eliminate groups of zombies by shooting the petrol can, or you can shoot the item box to get random rewards.   The dreadful virus creates different kinds of zombie, there are some zombies like big monster and some others can fast moving on the ground. There are even several zombie captains can be challenged by you. Fire on their weakness, it can help you to beat the strongest zombie captain. beat these zombies, find and hunt the zombie captain, then gain rewards and buy more powerful weapon.Exciting and exquisite game graphics will make you immerse in this zombie world, pull the trigger, shoot , gain the rewards, buy new guns, upgrade equipment, you will step on the way of hero!!!Game features:Free FPS game;Exciting and exquisite game graphics;Different kinds of guns and equipment;Can switch the scope mode as you wish;Exciting zombie boss fight;

description: Are you on spring break? Bring your friends together and join extremely risky hill climb  sledding! Explore icy road tracks and enjoy this snowmobile simulator game! Control your snowmobile and improve snow racing skills. Win this arctic race and prove that you are the best snow racer. FAST SNOWMOBILESAre you a big fan of snow motocross game? Then try to overcome all levels of this risky motocross game! All snowmobiles are well crafted and ready for snow racing. Choose one of your favorite snowmobile: Ruby, Ginger, Viper or Silver Fox and start hill climb sledding! Turn spring break in to the real adventure!ENVIRONMENTPrepare to race in extreme arctic conditions. Try to overcome one snow racer after another. Watch out for local penguins and explosive obstacles! Play this snowmobile simulator game, smash all ice balls and win the race! Have a great time during this year spring break.MISSIONThe mission of this snow motocross game is very simple - win the snow racing championship! You have to control your snowmobile as professional snow racer! Do not panic while making hill climb sledding stunts! Drive your mountain sled and enjoy the race!CONTROLSBecome the snow racer as you always wanted to be. Keep mountain climb sledding and enjoy this fun snowmobile simulator! Enjoy spring break  and play this snow motocross game as long as you want.◆ Ready, set, GO with the orange button. Make your snow bike or mountain sled move as fast as possible.◆ Use ARROW buttons to make crazy stunts, front and back flips.◆ Come back everyday to COLLECT COINS. Use them to get a new snow bike or mountain sled and unlock new worlds.◆ Race in 2 WORLDS: North Pole and Ice Land. WHAT TO EXPECT:◆ Intense snow racing◆ Smooth gameplay◆ Simple controls◆ Adorable snow bikes ◆ Breath-taking racing momentsEDUCATIONAL VALUESnowmobile simulator is good for learning to STIMULATE your reaction, DEVELOP hand-eye coordination, self-preservation and self-control. Enjoy snow bike or mountain sled ride IMPROVE problem solving, quick decision making and flexible thinking skills.MINI GAMESNeed a short break from winter motocross game? Get some rest and play these funny mini games: Balloon Pop, Puzzles, Memory Game, Coloring book and Match Shapes.NOTICEThis snow bike game is completely free to play, but it also offers in-app purchases.◆◆◆ ABOUT TINY LAB GAMES ◆◆◆Tiny Lab Games is a publisher and developer of innovative, high-quality and free-to-play mobile games designed for families. descriptionHTML:
Are you on spring break? Bring your friends together and join extremely risky hill climb sledding! Explore icy road tracks and enjoy this snowmobile simulator game! Control your snowmobile and improve snow racing skills. Win this arctic race and prove that you are the best snow racer.

FAST SNOWMOBILES

Are you a big fan of snow motocross game? Then try to overcome all levels of this risky motocross game! All snowmobiles are well crafted and ready for snow racing. Choose one of your favorite snowmobile: Ruby, Ginger, Viper or Silver Fox and start hill climb sledding! Turn spring break in to the real adventure!

ENVIRONMENT

Prepare to race in extreme arctic conditions. Try to overcome one snow racer after another. Watch out for local penguins and explosive obstacles! Play this snowmobile simulator game, smash all ice balls and win the race! Have a great time during this year spring break.

MISSION

The mission of this snow motocross game is very simple - win the snow racing championship! You have to control your snowmobile as professional snow racer! Do not panic while making hill climb sledding stunts! Drive your mountain sled and enjoy the race!

CONTROLS

Become the snow racer as you always wanted to be. Keep mountain climb sledding and enjoy this fun snowmobile simulator! Enjoy spring break and play this snow motocross game as long as you want.

◆ Ready, set, GO with the orange button. Make your snow bike or mountain sled move as fast as possible.
◆ Use ARROW buttons to make crazy stunts, front and back flips.
◆ Come back everyday to COLLECT COINS. Use them to get a new snow bike or mountain sled and unlock new worlds.
◆ Race in 2 WORLDS: North Pole and Ice Land.


WHAT TO EXPECT:

◆ Intense snow racing
◆ Smooth gameplay
◆ Simple controls
◆ Adorable snow bikes
◆ Breath-taking racing moments

EDUCATIONAL VALUE

Snowmobile simulator is good for learning to STIMULATE your reaction, DEVELOP hand-eye coordination, self-preservation and self-control. Enjoy snow bike or mountain sled ride IMPROVE problem solving, quick decision making and flexible thinking skills.

MINI GAMES

Need a short break from winter motocross game? Get some rest and play these funny mini games: Balloon Pop, Puzzles, Memory Game, Coloring book and Match Shapes.

NOTICE
This snow bike game is completely free to play, but it also offers in-app purchases.

◆◆◆ ABOUT TINY LAB GAMES ◆◆◆

Tiny Lab Games is a publisher and developer of innovative, high-quality and free-to-play mobile games designed for families. Our company is famous for its leading games series Fun Kid Racing. Search Tiny Lab Games on the app store and discover even more fun games!

Learn more about Tiny Lab Games and contact us at the following:

WEBSITE: http://www.tinylabkids.com
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/TinyLabKids
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/TinyLabKids
YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/TinyLabKids
POPJAM: TinyLabKids
EMAIL: support@tinylabproductions.com

description: Ever dreamed of becoming a Blood Test Doctor in Hospital? Make your dreams come true with Blood Test Doctor Hospital : Injection Simulator! Where you can experience being a Blood Test Injection Doctor in hospital full of crazy doctor, cure patient or use all your skills to perform the surgery simulator in Blood Test Doctor Hospital! Apply injection simulator to patient Arm & buttock and collect blood samples in test tubes to test diabetes & other Infection disease. Start Blood Test Doctor Hospital : Injection Simulator with patient’s IV before going to emergency hospital surgery room for surgery simulator. Become an emergency blood test emergency doctor in hospital simulator, start understanding hospital emergency medicine and methods along with IV fluids injection. The Er Emergency Hospital is crowded with patient that have various blood related diseases & you are the only doctor at the hospital who is going to treat the patient. Collect blood sample, test blood and analyze it with a microscope. With proper care and medicine, the patient can recover quickly. Insert cannula on patient hand to let the medicine get into his body quickly. A needle prick may cause slight bleeding from patient skin. Clean away the blood with a cotton swab.Practice your injection skills on sick patient in this Blood Test Doctor Hospital : Injection Simulator game. There might be inexperienced nurses & er emergency doctor who cause pain while injecting medicine with injection simulator. Get to the surgery simulator hospital now and attend your patient coming in er emergency ambulance. The poor patient have painful expressions and a fear in their pretty little eyes. Treat them with all the doctor tools and injection simulator at the er emergency surgery hospital. First you have to rub some numbing cotton over the area of body on where the injection simulator syringe needs to be put. From there you will take the blood test and other injection simulator tasks, be careful when you prick a needle. Apply an antiseptic cream with a cotton swab to avoid any bleeding from patient skin.Features:* Amazing injection simulator surgery games.* Draw blood from patients vein with injection.* Collect blood sample and test it with a microscope.* Send the blood sample to the hospital laboratory.* Use ER emergency doctor tools & injection to save lives in hospital.* Practice emergency surgery steps to perform surgery simulator.* Treat serious injuries on patients in ER emergency hospital surgery room.

Similar to Minecraft, can play offline. Easy controls, only downside is that it starts mining when you look around. Another downside is the people in chats can be rude and inapropriate, as well as I had to to restart my phone twice so far because of lags and crashing. There have also been ads popping up at the top of the screen that were not suitable for me, such as a dating site, and I am eleven years old, and my suggestion for that is you don't have inapropriate ads like that in the future updates of the game. Ads also interrupt my gameplay, but that has not bothered me yet. Generally, however, it is a great game.

It is fun but there is a problem which is how expensive coins are and skins. Please at least make skins 40 coins not 50 that would help a lot. But overall great game I think it was very similar to Minecraft and Roblox. Please lower prices for skins and I'll up the rating to 5!! I want to but I can't until you fix it. Hope this wasn't too much to read. 😐 To reply I've done the free coins but the Twitter ones don't work.

The ideas fun but the game sucked up so much of my memory very quickly causing the game to crash twice. It also killed my battery quickly even on Wi-Fi. There are a lot of glitches like it continuing to walk or break or place blocks long after I stopped touching the screen. Wished there was a sensitivity setting. I didn't even try to go into multiplayer because it was to laggy in single player.

Great. It could be better. But, if you don't have the real version of Minecraft this is perfect for you. Wait until Christmas and get iTunes cards and buy Minecraft pocket edition. But, until then enjoy this cool game.

description: Play Free Online Multiplayer Games, build block world with thousands of random players or friends worldwide. Play Free Survival Craft Games on the infinite randomly generated maps! Explore block worlds created by others in Multiplayer - Simulator. Upload your own maps from Singleplayer to Online Multiplayer servers to play with others! Build anything and everything from blocks alone or with other users worldwide in Online Multiplayer - Simulator. Protect your own online building with passwords so that only friends and people you know can access them! Play Survival Craft Games on the infinite maps! Find different resources, mine craft new items and build your own shelter to survive the nights! Watch out monsters: zombies, pumpkin heads and other aggressive monsters to save your health and hunt down eatable animals: cows, horses, pigs, chickens etc. to overcome your hunger. Customize your character by choosing unique skin from 160+ available skins for World of Cubes Survival Craft Games! Select your favorite Blocks Texture Pack: CLASSIC, MEDIEVAL, MODERN or TECHNOLOGY.Features:• Offline Survival Games on the infinite cube world with crafting and building, exploration, farming, mobs etc.• Online Creative Multiplayer or Offline Modes with block building, city building, exploration, multicraft • Built-in chat with multicolor support• Password protected Parental control for Global Chat. Disable chat for younger children. • 1000+ of user created maps for exploration in Creative Online Simulator• 160+ skins in 7+ themed skin packs: FUTURISTIC, MOSNTERS, CARTOON, SPORT and others• 20+ excited predefined servers to start playing and exploration • 4+ different Block Textures Packs to choose from• No subscription or additional fees requiredThis is not an official Mojang app. This sandbox free games is not associated or connected with Mojang AB and its Minecraft  Pocket Edition (MCPE). descriptionHTML:

So, the game itself is incredibly enjoyable and fun. Sometimes the controls get me here and there, but I'm sure, with time, I'd get use to it. The thing is, THERE IS NO TIME. Literally every minute, I get a thirty second ad. I'm just here building my home and making foundation when all of a sudden, an ad pops up. I say, "oh okay, it's just one, whatevs." WRONG. It is now ten, just over the past 5 minutes. This game has serious potential, if only it'd let us play the game and cut out the ads. I'm spending more time watching ads rather than using time to efficiently play the game. It irks me, so I uninstalled the ap. It really is a good game, just lower the ads from 2 per minute, kay?

Kill them all if needed.
So don’t hold back, grip your Launcher tightly, take a perfect aim, test your sniper shooter skills as a real dino hunting expert and don't let them escape. Experience grand sniper shooting in the real jungle wilderness environment as a real hero and win this hunting challenge.

comments: This is an extremely fun game. O have a few suggestions on how to fix things on the game. I noticed three things while playing this game. 1. There is not a continue playing option. This can easily be fixed and with all of the great work from Dvloper I think that this is not too far away. 2. I noticed you can uncrouch in the tunnel in the basement even though you are not all the way through. 3. Everything is in a certain place. If one object is in a certain place then if you are familiar with the game enough you will know where the other objects are. To be honest this is not a minor concern but still could be fixed. Other than that I can't stop playing! Thank you so much!!

It's a vary good game so hood i can't believe it's on mobile game! Also the game mechanics are so amazing as well. Then there's series of things you have to do that keeps you in the game for a long time; the theme and music fit the atmosphere, and there's not much of a problem with the game either. "This game gives me goosebumps!" (From Dashigames aka Dachi) he loves it as well too. #goodgamemakemore

I love this game, especially when you hide just in time and there's that tense moment wondering if she saw you. I get chills down my spine when I'm hiding and I hear her saying "I see you". If I could, I would give this game 100 stars. I would suggest having a mode after you beat Granny to become Granny because I think it would be cool to chase the player around the house. Also, I think the game would benefit from a much bigger house, more drawers and of course, more locks. Love the game, keep up the good work.

Realy fun i could play this game FOREVERRRR!!!!!! without even deleting it. its realy a chilling game though. Could you add a granny mode that you play as the granny and do whatever i want like: kill my grandkid, just watch my grandkid escape, and, or jumscare my grandkid. That would make it more fun and funny oh, and also could you make when i tranculize granny she won't dessapear and, make an animation where she stands up after she is tranculized that would be cool😊😊😊😊😊😀😀😀😀

It's really really really fun game.  But I think if you guys do some more improvements so it will be much fun.  Here's what I think:  1. I think you should make the house much bigger.  2. You should add more enemies for example:  child o' slenderina,  slenderman and the spiders.  3. You should add an Adventure mode.  Where you need to find some books or something like an emblem like that stuff to make them uncursed like that.  4. Last but not least, you should add more weapons for example:  Pistol,  sword,  injection etc.    If you do that,  it will be super cool and fun.   ThanQ 😃👍

It's definatly one of the better (more fun) horror games on the store, but I feel like there could be some more improvements. Firstly I think that if you've completed hard than there should be an (almost) impossible mode. Also minor details such as different textures and Easter eggs would be good. Last, I think that when you escape there should be an outside section where it's still got puzzles but it's more about the atmosphere. (Maybe that could just be for the "impossible mode") but it would make the game a lot more enjoyable. Also maybe a reward for escaping. (For incentive). Thank you and maybe you could take this into consideration :) also new app icon plz

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Granny.

Granny keeps you locked in her house.
Now you have to try to get out of her house, but be careful and quiet. She hears everything.
If you drop something on the floor, she hears it and comes running.
You can hide in wardrobes or under beds.
You have 5 days.

Good luck!

The game contains advertisement.

description: New MC Stories Snow enjoy a new, vicious, bandit, winter shooter in 2018! The plot of the game attracts saturation missions, the local police trying not to notice dealers and gangsters everywhere! Your goal is to get out of the local cops-clueless, to destroy the small gangs, to head the clandestine cartel and at the same time stay unnoticed before FBI.Features:· Exciting simulator of  life;· Play with the open world;· You do not have to follow missions, you can riot all over the city;· Improved graphical models of characters, cars, buildings;Get the full list of the privileges of this boss of the mafia passing the story line of missions, skate on stolen cars or buy new ones from the showroom (though when you have a virtual M16 rifle, car dealers give cars themselves, without money). Do not forget about the revenge of local gansters from whom You selected the flows of trafficking, can hire a couple and then only a sniper rifle is able to resolve such a difficult matter with the hunt for You! We hope for your support, leave comments on Google Play. Your opinion is important to us for further improvement!
descriptionHTML:
New MC Stories Snow enjoy a new, vicious, bandit, winter shooter in 2018! The plot of the game attracts saturation missions, the local police trying not to notice dealers and gangsters everywhere! Your goal is to get out of the local cops-clueless, to destroy the small gangs, to head the clandestine cartel and at the same time stay unnoticed before FBI.

Features:
· Exciting simulator of life;
· Play with the open world;
· You do not have to follow missions, you can riot all over the city;
· Improved graphical models of characters, cars, buildings;

Get the full list of the privileges of this boss of the mafia passing the story line of missions, skate on stolen cars or buy new ones from the showroom (though when you have a virtual M16 rifle, car dealers give cars themselves, without money). Do not forget about the revenge of local gansters from whom You selected the flows of trafficking, can hire a couple and then only a sniper rifle is able to resolve such a difficult matter with the hunt for You! We hope for your support, leave comments on Google Play. Your opinion is important to us for further improvement!
summary: New MC Stories Snow enjoy a new, vicious, bandit, winter shooter in 2018!
title: New Mad Stories Town Snow Edition 2018

comments: Really great gamplay, graphics, amazing controls which mind you are much more responsive than Sonic Dash or at least I think so, and this is the best concept I've ever seen. It's like Sonic Dash and a racing Sonic game had a baby. Best of all, this game captures the essence of Sonic in a brilliant way. Another thing I'd like to say is it's super balanced(besides Cream shes cheap as hell) but the fact is no character is better than the other cause they all have something unique about themselves.

The game is super choppy! I dont have a bad phone or Wi-Fi so I dont know the problem. If there was a mode like where you can reduce graphics that would be amazing. Besides that the rest is fine. Getting characters is easy, ads plays when after a match and/or if you want to double your rewards, and looks pretty nice.

I like it, really cool game, you never really know what's going to happen in a race. If you guys are making yet another character to race with, Im asking: can it please be Infinite, Big the 🐱, or our own custom character? Also, are you able to make different racing music in the game? I have a feeling that some people will get annoyed if the same "Lost Valley" song is being played over and over again.

This game is fun and amazing but at times, it gets boring. More levels and modes need to be added and new players need more chances to get emerald or plantinum chest. For some reason, a file wasnt working at and the game won't load. Plus, it won't let me sign in to Google play. Other than that its a good game.

I was enjoying the game but I started getting put against level 8's and 9's as a level 2.  Losing two races would take away 6 or 7  second place wins in a row, worth of progress.  I would lose 15-20 minutes worth of progress in two races. Wasting my time and effort.  Sometimes I swipe up to jump and my character just spin dashes instead, so my character just slams into an object or spins into a hole. Annoying.  After trying again and losing all gains in two losses, uninstalled.  Waste of time.

This game itself isn't  bad but it would have been better if there weren't  ads popping up every time I finish a race. It's  very annoying. I know this is a free game still using ads at that place isn't a good choice. I mean who does that? It really ruins the fun afterwards.

description: Is it a Robot? Is it a Shark? It’s Robo-Shark!!!Have you ever thought of being a menacing and daunting Robotic Sea Shark & rule both land & ocean?Robot Sea Shark Simulator is here to give you that unforgettable experience! Robot Shark roams with rage, attacking without fear, only to create destruction. Transform at will between a Shark and a Robot! You'll have the best of both worlds. Become a fearless Robot Shark. Obstacles are all around, your enemies are preparing to take you down, you must demolish them & be the deadly monster they all fear!Open Pandora's Box of Fun & Thrill!Enjoy a variety of action packed missions. Prepare yourself for the ultimate fun and thrilling experience. Battle & Fight with your opponents & try to get the maximum score to complete each mission. description: Before you - one of the strangest and crazy creations in the history of video games. The essence of the game is a kind of version of rock climbing, but you almost immediately make sure that there is no essence in it at all. All you can do is tirelessly getting over it climb up with a hammer on rocks, trees, buildings and rubbish. Warn immediately straight away - it's very difficult and, most likely, nothing but anger and frustration, you will not achieve it, so better go and do something useful. If it does not stop you, then getting over it forward to new heights!Your game character is an ordinary bald guy, quite content with his life. Well, maybe not quite ordinary - instead of legs he has a cast iron pot, and he is armed with a climby hammer. In short, this is the strangest hero that imagination can come up with. This unusual chopper is able to push off from the ground with his hammer and cling to them for protrusions, thereby paving his way upward. Do not wait for something else - in this game you can only getting over it climb up. What for? Few managed to find out how the game ends ...  Features:🔨 Climb upwards with the help of a hammer and a boiler (nothing else can be done here);🔨 Our philosophical reflections on the futility of being sounding on the background (after your next insulting getting over it fall it will be very useful);🔨 There is only one continuous level in the game (although we are not sure if it can be passed);🔨 Loss of all progress after one mistake (you just fall to the bottom, but there are no checkpoints here);🔨 Excellent training for your nervous system (if you are in a fit of rage do not throw your device into the wall at the very beginning); 🔨 If you still succeed in some miracle of reaching the climby hammer summit, you will receive incredible glory and honor!
descriptionHTML:
Before you - one of the strangest and crazy creations in the history of video games. The essence of the game is a kind of version of rock climbing, but you almost immediately make sure that there is no essence in it at all. All you can do is tirelessly getting over it climb up with a hammer on rocks, trees, buildings and rubbish. Warn immediately straight away - it's very difficult and, most likely, nothing but anger and frustration, you will not achieve it, so better go and do something useful. If it does not stop you, then getting over it forward to new heights!

Your game character is an ordinary bald guy, quite content with his life. Well, maybe not quite ordinary - instead of legs he has a cast iron pot, and he is armed with a climby hammer. In short, this is the strangest hero that imagination can come up with. This unusual chopper is able to push off from the ground with his hammer and cling to them for protrusions, thereby paving his way upward. Do not wait for something else - in this game you can only getting over it climb up. What for? Few managed to find out how the game ends ...


Features:

🔨 Climb upwards with the help of a hammer and a boiler (nothing else can be done here);

🔨 Our philosophical reflections on the futility of being sounding on the background (after your next insulting getting over it fall it will be very useful);

🔨 There is only one continuous level in the game (although we are not sure if it can be passed);

🔨 Loss of all progress after one mistake (you just fall to the bottom, but there are no checkpoints here);

🔨 Excellent training for your nervous system (if you are in a fit of rage do not throw your device into the wall at the very beginning);

🔨 If you still succeed in some miracle of reaching the climby hammer summit, you will receive incredible glory and honor!
developer: Volcano of Getting Over it Games
summary: Know the new degrees of frustration, climbing to the heights!
title: Getting Over Here Ascent

comments: Love playing but have 2 suggestions. We need another mill.  When we have large orders to fill it takes forever to complete those orders because the mull is tied up all the time. Maybe every 40 levels add a mill purchase option. When selling on the market, we need an option for a blind add or a neighborhood only sell or trade.. make these upgrades and so far game would be perfect!

It's great to be able to buy from other farms in theory. But there are WAY too many times that you click on something and it's either sold or not even in the roadside stand at all. The for sale paper needs to update quicker.  Also, it's very hard to accumulate any 'west bucks' in this game and you need them to do almost anything, so the game is a big money suck too. I'm deleting it.

I love these type of games just like hayday. I have noticed it freezes and takes ages to load the newspaper. Also would be helpful if it could tell you who needs help in the newspaper would help filling orders quicker. Also I have noticed alot of people selling the same parts and harder to get others and it's extremely rare to get the land parts without paying

The game doesnt give enough case vs things to buy or fix.  Also have issues with getting product into the alloted spaces.  I thought it was my screen but had it cleaned thoroughly and it still happens.  It takes several attempts!!!  The story is cute.  The graphics are cute as well.  Ive noticed it has a couple of choices from other games Ive played on older phones. I would suggest the game to others but get the issues fixed and itll be a 5star game.

I love playing these games. I'm not sure why we are rating gameplay they offer apps not a game. It's crazy how they ask us to rate game at the beginning of game. We haven't learned the bad points. This game makes us pay for treasure chest instead of giving us to them free like most games. Which means we have to pay for everything. Totally not fair. Takes the fun out of game.

The game itself is fabulous. Cute farm. Good graphics. Good work on that front. Yet being a bit more generous with westbucks in game or making some things more payable with your coins. I get that games don't create themself. But I personally am more likely to pay for games you can actually play for a bit after doing a purchase. And I don't really get that feeling here. But none the less the game itself is a work of art 😊

description: Heavy Duty Tractor: Simulator Farm Builder Game 3D is an amazing tractor driving game where user will play the role of village farmer who intends to grow crops on his fields.  Each of the exciting levels will test your driving skills and your ability to handle heavy cargo while driving up hill on hilly road. In the process of growing crops farmer needs a tractor to drive. You need to have really good off road hill climb skills so that the drive is easy. After obtaining crops the next stage is to transport these crops to markets so tractor again will be used for this process. This farming tractor game is hard driving game there is a risk of impossible fall down from steep hills and dangerous mountains. The user first have to perform all the operations that are necessary like Land Preparation where tractor will be used with set of blades. As a best farmer you are a designated driver to transport cargo in the valley of Seattle hills and village farm. The user will plow the fields and later will seed the fields in the main time tractor will be used to spray crops that they never get any insecticides. In this ultimate farming real chained tractor driving cargo diversion you will begin to influence the ground to prepare and with the cultivator you can accomplish this. Once the crops are ready the user will transport these crops to the city markets while drive through bumpy roads and rugged terrains while driving offroad tracks. Fulfill your cargo transportation dreams with the new heavy tractor trolley driving simulator. Dry run your extreme cargo transportation skills The user can apply powerful 4x4 Transmission while going uphill to the mountain tracks that are narrow. The curvy and sharp turns are supposed to be dangerous when user will drive a loaded cargo tractor trolley over it.  The user needs to deliver goods items in this transport simulation as the user will take cargo items and crops to the city while driving on the offroad tracks. The user also take the animals and deliver these animals, take the tractor uphill and drive the tractor on Narrow Roads.	Let us explore some amazing features:🚜      Realistic graphics.🚜      Hill climb & Mud drive.🚜      4x4 off road faming tractors.🚜      Open world Village and offroad tracks.🚜      Dynamic 360 camera angles.🚜      Variety of camera views.🚜      Smooth and easy controls.🚜      Multiple controller scheme.🚜      Tilt, steering and button control.🚜      Motion sensor and tilt sensor integration.🚜      Sensitive tilt controls.🚜      Specialized Physics engine.🚜      Weather engine.🚜      Farmer Tractor and Cargo Tractor🚜      Open World sound effects (SFX).🚜      Variety of visual effects (VFX).
descriptionHTML:
Heavy Duty Tractor: Simulator Farm Builder Game 3D is an amazing tractor driving game where user will play the role of village farmer who intends to grow crops on his fields. Each of the exciting levels will test your driving skills and your ability to handle heavy cargo while driving up hill on hilly road. In the process of growing crops farmer needs a tractor to drive. You need to have really good off road hill climb skills so that the drive is easy. After obtaining crops the next stage is to transport these crops to markets so tractor again will be used for this process. This farming tractor game is hard driving game there is a risk of impossible fall down from steep hills and dangerous mountains. The user first have to perform all the operations that are necessary like Land Preparation where tractor will be used with set of blades. As a best farmer you are a designated driver to transport cargo in the valley of Seattle hills and village farm. The user will plow the fields and later will seed the fields in the main time tractor will be used to spray crops that they never get any insecticides.
In this ultimate farming real chained tractor driving cargo diversion you will begin to influence the ground to prepare and with the cultivator you can accomplish this. Once the crops are ready the user will transport these crops to the city markets while drive through bumpy roads and rugged terrains while driving offroad tracks. Fulfill your cargo transportation dreams with the new heavy tractor trolley driving simulator. Dry run your extreme cargo transportation skills The user can apply powerful 4x4 Transmission while going uphill to the mountain tracks that are narrow. The curvy and sharp turns are supposed to be dangerous when user will drive a loaded cargo tractor trolley over it. The user needs to deliver goods items in this transport simulation as the user will take cargo items and crops to the city while driving on the offroad tracks. The user also take the animals and deliver these animals, take the tractor uphill and drive the tractor on Narrow Roads.

description: Fasten your seat belt, get ready for an impossible ride on impossible track. Grab your favorite vehicle and start your car racing game now!Get groovy with high end sports cars on mega ramp. Sports cars not your choice? No worries, try muscle cars, mountain cars or you can even try huge trucks and demolition derbies monster vehicles. If you still looking for more fun  or ready to have great stunt driving then we also have train driving take off on mega ramp with high speed demolishing and crushing all other cars or trucks on the way.Take a real test of driving trains or cars on impossible tracks, jump off from a great speed to land and crush parking cars or trains on the ground to earn skill points.It's not a rooftop jump or normal stunt likely found in action games. You must take a high speed on the ramp, control the speed and jump off the track to destroy various monster vehicles. But be careful while car driving on slope as your car drifts like hell. Car drifting games are little easy to control but this simulator game will test your driving skills.
descriptionHTML:
Fasten your seat belt, get ready for an impossible ride on impossible track. Grab your favorite vehicle and start your car racing game now!

Get groovy with high end sports cars on mega ramp. Sports cars not your choice? No worries, try muscle cars, mountain cars or you can even try huge trucks and demolition derbies monster vehicles. If you still looking for more fun or ready to have great stunt driving then we also have train driving take off on mega ramp with high speed demolishing and crushing all other cars or trucks on the way.

Take a real test of driving trains or cars on impossible tracks, jump off from a great speed to land and crush parking cars or trains on the ground to earn skill points.

It's not a rooftop jump or normal stunt likely found in action games. You must take a high speed on the ramp, control the speed and jump off the track to destroy various monster vehicles. But be careful while car driving on slope as your car drifts like hell. Car drifting games are little easy to control but this simulator game will test your driving skills.

comments: Nice Game! At the start its easy, like many players said, but maybe they didnt stick through to further their games,I believe the easy start is needed to build for the later part of the games specially if you are a f2p player. Though being F2P isnt as bad here as it is on other games (speaking from experience). I like thier new updates now and specially the "sweep" requirement. Thanks Devs! my only hope is that please make planting/ crops a little easier on us common folks,it gets a little bit tiring to have to press from seed>plant repeat (depending on your available field). Anyway, besides this i do not regret playing the game, easy controls, f2p friendly, graphics is good, controls are good. Keep up the good work devs!looking forward to more updates

description: The Survival Hunter Games 2 is a blockbuster hit loaded with new and even better features! Download today and experience for yourself one of the best first person shooter games available on the market! ✲✲✲GAME STORY✲✲✲We are an advanced civilization. One that has survived, and even thrived from the apocalypse. We are a world with many technical and otherworldly advances that boast the ability to open portals to other dimensions. This was done in order to study the effects of different consequences and alternate reality. It seemed to be safe enough, with all the safety precautions that were taken, but then the unthinkable happened. After the sustainment system failed during a massive power outage, the safety shield that kept the portal from being accessed by either side was lowered, and the vacuum ripped several agents from their stations, trapping them in these alternate dimensions...As one of these agents sucked inside the portal, you are now trapped in a dimension where the world is drastically different, and all because of a choice made by a handful of men several millennia ago. This world is a treacherous place filled with dangers at every turn. You must remain alive in this bleak world until help can reach you... IF help can reach you.✲✲✲GAME PLAY✲✲✲The game comes fully loaded with amazing features! Our new game interface is extremely user friendly, and boasts easy to play touch screen controls that allow you to effortlessly run, jump, sprint, reload, aim, shoot and more! The new menu screen includes map style level select and settings screen. Gain game insight in between maps during loading with tip screens, and begin each game with mission style instructions! Before you begin your first level, you can watch a short video ad in order to earn a power up. You may opt not to watch, but you'll lose out on the advantage. As soon as the game begins, a timer will begin to count down. If you are able to beat the level quickly enough, you will earn a permanent weapon, which can be used in all other levels! If you do not beat the clock, you can still advance through the game, just without the permanent weapon. Fight stronger, more intelligent enemies, who make this game an intense battle of wit, stealth and skill! Enjoy hand-to-hand combat and precision aiming to take down enemies. Collect your blocky weapons and get ready to aim and shoot!!Features:-User friendly interface with touch pad controls-Timers-Power-ups-Ammo and weapon collection-Jump, aim and run-Mini-map to spot your dangerous foes-Mission orders-Hand-to-hand combat
descriptionHTML:
The Survival Hunter Games 2 is a blockbuster hit loaded with new and even better features! Download today and experience for yourself one of the best first person shooter games available on the market!


✲✲✲GAME STORY✲✲✲
We are an advanced civilization. One that has survived, and even thrived from the apocalypse. We are a world with many technical and otherworldly advances that boast the ability to open portals to other dimensions. This was done in order to study the effects of different consequences and alternate reality. It seemed to be safe enough, with all the safety precautions that were taken, but then the unthinkable happened.

After the sustainment system failed during a massive power outage, the safety shield that kept the portal from being accessed by either side was lowered, and the vacuum ripped several agents from their stations, trapping them in these alternate dimensions...

As one of these agents sucked inside the portal, you are now trapped in a dimension where the world is drastically different, and all because of a choice made by a handful of men several millennia ago. This world is a treacherous place filled with dangers at every turn. You must remain alive in this bleak world until help can reach you... IF help can reach you.

✲✲✲GAME PLAY✲✲✲
The game comes fully loaded with amazing features! Our new game interface is extremely user friendly, and boasts easy to play touch screen controls that allow you to effortlessly run, jump, sprint, reload, aim, shoot and more!

The new menu screen includes map style level select and settings screen. Gain game insight in between maps during loading with tip screens, and begin each game with mission style instructions! Before you begin your first level, you can watch a short video ad in order to earn a power up. You may opt not to watch, but you'll lose out on the advantage.

As soon as the game begins, a timer will begin to count down. If you are able to beat the level quickly enough, you will earn a permanent weapon, which can be used in all other levels! If you do not beat the clock, you can still advance through the game, just without the permanent weapon.

Fight stronger, more intelligent enemies, who make this game an intense battle of wit, stealth and skill! Enjoy hand-to-hand combat and precision aiming to take down enemies. Collect your blocky weapons and get ready to aim and shoot!!

Features:
-User friendly interface with touch pad controls
-Timers
-Power-ups
-Ammo and weapon collection
-Jump, aim and run
-Mini-map to spot your dangerous foes
-Mission orders
-Hand-to-hand combat

summary: Your mission is to survive and kill every enemy you come in contact with
