description: Solitaire Collection is a BRAND-NEW collection of various solitaire card games, which contains Classic Solitaire(also known as Klondike or Patience), Spider, FreeCell, Pyramid & TriPeaks(TriTowers, Three Peaks, and Triple Peaks). ⚡ HIGHLIGHTS ⚡ - Classic Solitaire Gameplay:We kept all the games true to the spirit of the classic solitaires, and specifically optimized the games for an unmatched solitaire experience on mobile devices.- Fun & Addictive Challenges:Solitaire card games are fun and challenging puzzle games that anyone can enjoy! Gameplay is very simple to start but hard to master. Millions of users have fun for hours every day all over the world!- Beautiful Designs & Customizable Themes:By removing all the unnecessary features, our game is the most easy-to-play with clean and intuitive designs. Meanwhile, we have added 100+ beautiful themes on top of the classic card game design. ✅ INCLUDES ✅- CLASSIC SOLITAIREIn Classic Solitaire (also known as Klondike or Patience), try to collect all the cards in 1 card or 3 card mode. Don’t forget to try the Vegas scoring mode as well!- SPIDER SOLITAIREPlay with two decks of 52 cards each. Depending on difficulty, the deck consists of one, two or four different suits. Try to collect them with fewest moves possible!- FREECELL SOLITAIREWin a game by creating four stacks of cards, one per suit. The secret of winning is the extra four cells!- PYRAMID SOLITAIRECombine two cards that add up to 13 to remove them from the board. Challenge yourself to reach the top of the Pyramid and clear as many boards as you can!- TRIPEAKS SOLITAIRESelect cards in a sequence, earn combo points, and clear as many boards as you can before you run out of deals!- DAILY CHALLENGESLooking forward for more challenges? Try to solve all daily challenges! The challenges are guaranteed solvable and will be updated every day!- TOURNAMENTJoin the tournament and play against real players from all over the world, practice your skills and get the first place in the weekly rank leaderboard!✨ FEATURES ✨♠ Daily challenges with different levels♠ Customizable beautiful themes♠ 2 Players Tournaments♠ 4 Players Tournaments♠ Up to 10 top records♠ Klondike Solitaire Draw 1 card or 3 cards ♠ Standard or Vegas Casino scoring♠ Timer mode♠ Left-handed mode♠ Landscape mode♠ Multiple languages supported♠ Single tap or drag&drop to move cards♠ Auto-collect cards on completion♠ Auto-save game in play♠ Feature to Undo moves♠ Feature to use Hints♠ Play offline! No Wi-Fi required Like playing Patience or Klondike Solitaire on PC?It is surely the BEST solitaire collection in your hands!Train your brain as well as kill time with friends together!COME and TRY our Solitaire Collection for FREE! ★★★ 100% Addictive & Fun, Download It NOW! ★★★Any problems or question? Email us to support@solitairegames.freshdesk.com
descriptionHTML:
Solitaire Collection is a BRAND-NEW collection of various solitaire card games, which contains Classic Solitaire(also known as Klondike or Patience), Spider, FreeCell, Pyramid & TriPeaks(TriTowers, Three Peaks, and Triple Peaks).


⚡ HIGHLIGHTS ⚡

- Classic Solitaire Gameplay:
We kept all the games true to the spirit of the classic solitaires, and specifically optimized the games for an unmatched solitaire experience on mobile devices.

- Fun & Addictive Challenges:
Solitaire card games are fun and challenging puzzle games that anyone can enjoy! Gameplay is very simple to start but hard to master. Millions of users have fun for hours every day all over the world!

- Beautiful Designs & Customizable Themes:
By removing all the unnecessary features, our game is the most easy-to-play with clean and intuitive designs. Meanwhile, we have added 100+ beautiful themes on top of the classic card game design.

 
✅ INCLUDES ✅

- CLASSIC SOLITAIRE
In Classic Solitaire (also known as Klondike or Patience), try to collect all the cards in 1 card or 3 card mode. Don’t forget to try the Vegas scoring mode as well!

- SPIDER SOLITAIRE
Play with two decks of 52 cards each. Depending on difficulty, the deck consists of one, two or four different suits. Try to collect them with fewest moves possible!

- FREECELL SOLITAIRE
Win a game by creating four stacks of cards, one per suit. The secret of winning is the extra four cells!

- PYRAMID SOLITAIRE
Combine two cards that add up to 13 to remove them from the board. Challenge yourself to reach the top of the Pyramid and clear as many boards as you can!

- TRIPEAKS SOLITAIRE
Select cards in a sequence, earn combo points, and clear as many boards as you can before you run out of deals!

- DAILY CHALLENGES
Looking forward for more challenges? Try to solve all daily challenges! The challenges are guaranteed solvable and will be updated every day!

- TOURNAMENT
Join the tournament and play against real players from all over the world, practice your skills and get the first place in the weekly rank leaderboard!


✨ FEATURES ✨

♠ Daily challenges with different levels
♠ Customizable beautiful themes
♠ 2 Players Tournaments
♠ 4 Players Tournaments
♠ Up to 10 top records
♠ Klondike Solitaire Draw 1 card or 3 cards
♠ Standard or Vegas Casino scoring
♠ Timer mode
♠ Left-handed mode
♠ Landscape mode
♠ Multiple languages supported
♠ Single tap or drag&drop to move cards
♠ Auto-collect cards on completion
♠ Auto-save game in play
♠ Feature to Undo moves
♠ Feature to use Hints
♠ Play offline! No Wi-Fi required
 
Like playing Patience or Klondike Solitaire on PC?
It is surely the BEST solitaire collection in your hands!
Train your brain as well as kill time with friends together!

COME and TRY our Solitaire Collection for FREE!
★★★ 100% Addictive & Fun, Download It NOW! ★★★

Any problems or question?
Email us to support@solitairegames.freshdesk.com

description: Mega Monsters is a Q version mobile phone game operated by Teebik inc. We have exquisite picture, maverick protagonist, cool and gorgeous battle, strange and novel mega monsters. Colorful activities will bring you adventure, exciting and other unprecedented game experience.The most important damage in game is from the pet. Which can control the attack speed of pet is clicking on mobile phone screen , and the corresponding pet attribute will add extra damage to the Boss.Tap! Tap!! Tap!!! To fight the demonlord.The characters can also improve their attack power through skill progression, upgrading of treasures, etc. When the number of levels is higher, the rewards will be improved.The game is not only to compete with the big monster, the mastery of time and the casting of skills are also a major topic.Don't forget to use various resources to improve your fighting power. Bring your pet and let's drop the BOSS together!!
descriptionHTML:
Mega Monsters is a Q version mobile phone game operated by Teebik inc.

We have exquisite picture, maverick protagonist, cool and gorgeous battle, strange and novel mega monsters. Colorful activities will bring you adventure, exciting and other unprecedented game experience.

The most important damage in game is from the pet. Which can control the attack speed of pet is clicking on mobile phone screen , and the corresponding pet attribute will add extra damage to the Boss.
Tap! Tap!! Tap!!! To fight the demonlord.

The characters can also improve their attack power through skill progression, upgrading of treasures, etc. When the number of levels is higher, the rewards will be improved.

The game is not only to compete with the big monster, the mastery of time and the casting of skills are also a major topic.

Don't forget to use various resources to improve your fighting power. Bring your pet and let's drop the BOSS together!!

comments: Brilliant puzzle game. Love the fact that one readily forgets the solution afterwards. Can always come back to replay certain puzzles.  How to make it better? Some puzzles have more than one solution. Challenge the players to find all the solutions.

!!!Crushes every time I try to login with google acc!!!  The game concept is just as great as Kami one, it's definitely worth having both. The only issue is it is a by buggy when it comes to things that need internet - cant always access daily challenges, crashes when I try google play login

Such a simple concept for a puzzle game that when I started, thought this would be easy. But it gets so much harder. And that's the charm. One you solve that it feels so satisfying. Recommended for everyone try this out.

I've played a ton of mobile games from multiple genres and I can honestly say that KAMI is one of my most favorite games of all time. The game is simple to play, but challaging enough to keep it interesting. Also, the style and graphics are some of my favorites I've ever seen in a mobile game. I highly recommend this game, even if you don't like puzzle games because I'd argue that it's not only just a game but also an experience!
Just when you thought you figure it all out, there's just more ways revealed itself on how to play. Just only wish that the graphic is HD. I like beautiful puzzle game!

I spent money to remove ads on my previous phone and also made it to like lvl 70+. Now the ad free purchase remains as i don't get ads in between. However, the lvl progress is not restorable. Whenever I try to restore it, the game crashes.
description: Sequel to #1 puzzle game, KAMIThe calming, addictive puzzle game is back!With over 100 hand-crafted puzzles, and with over one million player created puzzles created worldwide, Kami 2 takes you on a mind-twisting journey that combines logic and problem-solving.Can you achieve perfection?Flood each puzzle with a single color in as few moves as possible to claim a 'Perfect' sticker. But watch out for subtle new tricks and fiendish surprises.Want even more?Beat the global Daily Challenge, earn a winning streak and compare your scores to other players. Test yourself on thousands of user-generated puzzles, uploaded daily.Get creative and take on the world.Craft your own KAMI designs using the Puzzle Builder. Design and share your creations, send them to your friends and challenge the world to beat your score.
descriptionHTML:
Sequel to #1 puzzle game, KAMI

The calming, addictive puzzle game is back!

With over 100 hand-crafted puzzles, and with over one million player created puzzles created worldwide, Kami 2 takes you on a mind-twisting journey that combines logic and problem-solving.

Can you achieve perfection?
Flood each puzzle with a single color in as few moves as possible to claim a 'Perfect' sticker. But watch out for subtle new tricks and fiendish surprises.

Want even more?
Beat the global Daily Challenge, earn a winning streak and compare your scores to other players. Test yourself on thousands of user-generated puzzles, uploaded daily.

Get creative and take on the world.
Craft your own KAMI designs using the Puzzle Builder. Design and share your creations, send them to your friends and challenge the world to beat your score.

Preston Park House
South Road, Brighton BN1 6SB

description: The cold winds brings chimes of joy and blessing because a new and royal life is about to be born into this world pretty soon!!! The queen of the kingdom, located someplace far away, in the land of snow and the power of ice is pregnant with her first child and could be expecting the baby any time soon and will claim the tittle of ice mommy very soon as well!!!To serve the royalty, the kingdom needs the best of everything!! Similarly, the kingdom is in search for the best and the most experienced gynecologist, nurse and the doctor!! Your clinic and hospital have been advised best for this activity because the queen trusts you the most!!! Soon witness, the miracle of life in the land of snow!! Since ice mommy is in her critical stage of pregnancy, she might need to come to the hospital any time soon, so you must be prepared for operation with your surgical instruments at all times!!! Ice mommy also has to prepare a feast for the celebration of the coming of her baby!!! Make sure to conduct a safe and healthy surgery of the ice mommy pregnant princess and no complications must occur!!! Before the preparations one day, mommy starts feeling sick and that kind of sickness meant it is time to go for surgery now and immediately too for that matter!!! Drive immediately to the surgery hospital the moment she falls sick!!Once in the hospital, perform all the necessary body assessments for ice mommy!! For example, give her oxygen to breathe properly, then check her blood level and give her blood. Then comes testing the temperature to see how well she is to undergo surgery!! Next step includes taking ultrasound, and after some time it is emergency surgery time for ice mommy!!! Before the cesarean operation officially begins give ice mommy a good anesthesia medicine and then slowly start cutting the stomach area. Get the baby out and then clean the mark after stitching up the stomach!! Then when you have cleaned the baby, give it to mommy so it is mommy and baby together at last!!!Please the kingdom and the land of snow by rescuing ice mommy and baby during the pregnancy surgery emergency operation!!! ||| HOW TO PLAY ||| •	Begin the operation game play  •	Select the ice mommy you want to operate •	Multiple scenes; play one by one to select level •	Follow the hand indicator instructions on screen and perform the tasks •	Take temperature •	Blood test •	Put on Oxygen mask •	Give anesthesia  •	Check ultrasound •	Cut stomach •	Perform cesarean surgery•	Get baby out •	Stitch the cut mark •	Clean baby and give to mommy •	Enjoy with baby and show to the entire snow land and kingdom Thank you for rescuing mommy and baby!!
descriptionHTML:
The cold winds brings chimes of joy and blessing because a new and royal life is about to be born into this world pretty soon!!! The queen of the kingdom, located someplace far away, in the land of snow and the power of ice is pregnant with her first child and could be expecting the baby any time soon and will claim the tittle of ice mommy very soon as well!!!

To serve the royalty, the kingdom needs the best of everything!! Similarly, the kingdom is in search for the best and the most experienced gynecologist, nurse and the doctor!!
Your clinic and hospital have been advised best for this activity because the queen trusts you the most!!! Soon witness, the miracle of life in the land of snow!!

Since ice mommy is in her critical stage of pregnancy, she might need to come to the hospital any time soon, so you must be prepared for operation with your surgical instruments at all times!!! Ice mommy also has to prepare a feast for the celebration of the coming of her baby!!!

Make sure to conduct a safe and healthy surgery of the ice mommy pregnant princess and no complications must occur!!!
Before the preparations one day, mommy starts feeling sick and that kind of sickness meant it is time to go for surgery now and immediately too for that matter!!! Drive immediately to the surgery hospital the moment she falls sick!!

Once in the hospital, perform all the necessary body assessments for ice mommy!! For example, give her oxygen to breathe properly, then check her blood level and give her blood. Then comes testing the temperature to see how well she is to undergo surgery!!
Next step includes taking ultrasound, and after some time it is emergency surgery time for ice mommy!!! Before the cesarean operation officially begins give ice mommy a good anesthesia medicine and then slowly start cutting the stomach area.

Get the baby out and then clean the mark after stitching up the stomach!! Then when you have cleaned the baby, give it to mommy so it is mommy and baby together at last!!!
Please the kingdom and the land of snow by rescuing ice mommy and baby during the pregnancy surgery emergency operation!!!

||| HOW TO PLAY |||
• Begin the operation game play
• Select the ice mommy you want to operate
• Multiple scenes; play one by one to select level
• Follow the hand indicator instructions on screen and perform the tasks
• Take temperature
• Blood test
• Put on Oxygen mask
• Give anesthesia
• Check ultrasound
• Cut stomach
• Perform cesarean surgery
• Get baby out
• Stitch the cut mark
• Clean baby and give to mommy
• Enjoy with baby and show to the entire snow land and kingdom
Thank you for rescuing mommy and baby!!
developerAddress: MANAMA, BAHRAIN
summary: The queen of ice, in the land of snow, needs your help in her pregnancy surgery!
title: Snow Queen Mommy Surgery

comments: Would be nice if there was a redo button for the last move. I'm very quick when playing and I often misplace a block. Also, why does the Apple version have stars and the android version doesn't? I was trying so hard to earn enough stars to buy the colour packs on my iPod, and I got quite disappointed that I can't do that on android. I guess I'll just delete the game off android since there's really no goal to the game now.

Very fun and addicting but nice calm relaxing game. Ads only happen after each round and not a big deal. If you want to keep playing this game FREE then add up with the package. Quiet whinning about ads. Someonbe has to pay the creators for this game including the upkeep and updates. How else will the creator make his money? 2 choices, either gets ads or charge to download. So I can deal with the ads. It's a FREE APP.

Way too many ads. I just need something for my fingers to do while listening to podcasts but this constantly interrupts my listening pretty much after every round. I really liked the game but I have had it with thw ads and am uninstalling. It's just not worth it.

I really like the game but as many others have said their are too many ads. Ads after every round and sometimes in the middle of the round which makes you start over and that gets annoying. Too many of thr same ads. I also agree their needs to be a redo button. It does get a bit pintle after you hit the goal but still fun.

Too many adds, and it makes me restart every time an add plays, I've only had this app for 1 min, and have already played 50 rounds... Not. Cool. I would be okay with the adds if I could at least pick up on where I last left off.

I'm not quite sure what's happened to this game. It's very straightforward and strangely addictive. However, just today after Android's OS update, it performs much worse. Where before when you pick up a block, it is elevated slightly above your finger so you can see where it's going, now it's just under your finger, making this game frustratingly impossible. If this is due to an interaction with the OS update, then 1010 is due for it's own update.
